title: Evolve Manual and Templated Dockerfiles with Automation
author: Rak Siva
description: Manually crafting Dockerfiles presents challenges for developers. One possible solution is to autogenerate them with an abstraction tool.
cntitle: 使用自动化演进手册和模板化 Dockerfile
cndescription: 手动制作 Dockerfile 对开发者来说具有挑战性。一种可能的解决方案是使用抽象工具自动生成它们。
